name: SparkPost traffic generator
description: Traffic generator service that can be deployed on Heroku

SPARKPOST_HOST.description: The URL of the SparkPost API service you're using. Defaults to https://api.sparkpost.com

SPARKPOST_API_KEY.description: API key on your SparkPost account, with transmission rights

MESSAGES_PER_MINUTE.description: Messages to be sent per minute, from 1 to 10000

FROM_EMAIL.description: FROM address belonging to a valid sending domain on your account.  e.g. fred@example.com
